markdown: To: Dr. Heidbreder From: Dr. Soroker Date: Nov. 14, 1967 Subj: PPBS Page 5 C. Environmental Health 1. Reduce environmental health hazards and dilapidated housing 20% in 1 year in SE, Central, Harbor, E.L.A. and NE districts (see attach- ment #3). D. Mental Health 1. Reduce high rate of admissions to mental hospital 20% in 1 year in Central, S, SE, HW, SW, Inglewood and Compton districts (see attach- ment #6). 2. Reduce high suicide rates 20% in 1 year in Central district (& others). 3. Reduce high rate of alcoholism 20% in 1 year in Central, SE, Harbor districts. 4. Reduce high incidence of narcotics and drug abuse 20% in 1 year in NE, E.L.A. and among college population. 5. Reduce incidence of emotional disturbance associated with MR in all districts. E. Chronic Disease 1. Reduce high rate of death and disability from heart disease, CA, stroke and diabetes 20% in 2 years County-wide. 2. Reduce high mortality from lung CA 20% in 2 years in Central, HW and SM districts (see attachment #5). Source: https://www.industrydocuments.ucsf.edu/docs/phvd0227
